name: TEST
purpose: This function will determine whether a bit or bits are set in a byte.

parts.description: Field to check. The function will only test the first byte/character.

This value determines which bits to check. To set the proper value use the following\nguide:
Bit#
Value

7 128

6 64

5 32

4 16

3 8

2 4

1 2

0 1

return_type: L If the bit(s) is (are) set (1 not 0), the function will return .T. Otherwise it will return .F.
